entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
